TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 660
TEI.2.document_title: Thomas Kirkham to Stephen F Austin, 05-06-1831

barker_notes.barker_summary: Thomas Kirkham to Austin, Franklin, La., May 6, 1831. His daughter wants place as "tuteress in a female academy." (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 660
